<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass is responsible for selecting generic machine instructions to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// target-specific instructions.  It relies on the InstructionSelector provided</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// by the target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Selection is done by examining blocks in post-order, and instructions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reverse order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\post for all inst in MF: not isPreISelGenericOpcode(inst.opcode)</span></CodeLine>
